1.title: Специалист службы технической поддержки (HelpDesk)
1.job_description:
[
Специалист службы технической поддержкиКомпания «SYNCHRON» — системный интегратор, корпоративный дата\интернет провайдер предлагает интересную работу в команде активных и высокопрофессиональных специалистов, а так же перспективы карьерного и профессионального роста в стабильно развивающейся компании.Заработная плата по результатам собеседования.Требования к кандидатам:
Желателен опыт работы в сфере телекоммуникаций или в сфере информационных технологий.
Опыт администрирования линейки операционных систем Майкрософт (Microsoft Windows 2008 — Windows 2012).
Навыки работы и настройки офисного оборудования (телефоны, принтеры, сканеры, факс).
Опытный пользователь офисных пакетов и приложений Microsoft office.
Базовое понимание сетевых технологий, стека протоколов TCP/IP.
Базовое предсталение о сервисах многоранговой сети. 
Английский язык разговорный, уровень pre-intermediate.
Активность, ответсвенность, умение организовывать своё рабочее время, презентабельность.
Функциональные обязанности: 
Техническая поддержка пользователей, включая региональные представительства:
Выполнение регламентных работ.
Установка, подключение, конфигурирование компьютеров и программ. Первичная диагностика проблем технического характера.
Эффективная (корректная) диагностика состояния инфраструктуры на основе информации, предоставленной пользователем.
Анализ инцидентов.
Регистрация обращений в соответствии с алгоритмом регистрации.
Мы предлагаем:
возможность обучения и профессионального развития;
официальное трудоустройство, оплачиваемый отпуск и больничные;
стабильный график: 09.00−18:00, 5/2.
Зароботная плата по результатам собеседования, от 17000грн.Присылайте свои резюме на электронный адрес [відгукнутися]Дополнительную информацию о компании можно просмотреть на нашем сайте www.synchron.com.ua
]

[

Обязанности:Необходимо производить сравнительный анализ товара в таблицах эксель и на сайте, по определенным заданным критериям. Товар с нужными критериями выносить в отдельную таблицуВаш любимый цвет?
]

4.title: Content manager to Lviv
4.job_description:
[
You are to:
Know English as if it is your native language. Seriously, if you do, the rest of responsibilities and obligations will be rediculously easy for you.
Comprehend English language by listening to native speakers.
Write short English texts on the basis of what you’ve heard from native speakers.
Be creative. It is not just usual requirement which is here only because every employer puts it in job description. We look for creative, wit people with good sense of humor.
Search for necessary suitable visual content.
Be punctual.
Good to have:
Experience in content management in English
Understanding how to work with photoshop-or-similar services
Experience in copywriting
What you’ll get except friendly colleagues, good salary, and ability to grow:
This would be the most interesting job you’ve ever (and for many, probably, you’ll ever) have. You have never met this before because we are the first in the world who are doing this. Want to proudly say that you work at «new Instagram/Facebook/Google»? Let’s get acquainted :)
If you are smart enough to offer new directions, features, experiments, hypothesis etc — go ahead, we’ll only support you.
Flexible schedule. If you perform your job well, we’ll not control you.
Our customers are US citizens. So, your English will always be on the highest level.
We take care of every team member as if he/she belongs to our family.

]

12.title: Translation Project Manager
12.job_description:
[
PROJECT MANAGER — TRANSLATION (REMOTE POSITION)MAIN PURPOSE OF JOB INTROMaven International is seeking a remotely based project manager to support operations of existing and newly opened offices.This is remote position, the candidate can be based anywhere and work from home or preferred location, so long he or she is able to deliver. Please note that this position could be part time, project based work at initial stages before we go for full engagement. Preference is given for female candidates.The Project Manager is responsible for ensuring the successful planning, execution, tracking, delivery and closure of client projects. The candidate is a driven but steady individual. Most importantly, the ideal candidate must demonstrate ability to: multitask in a fast-paced environment, work well with people from a variety of different backgrounds and cultures, build relationships with clients and co-workers, work as part of a team and alone, take active measures to solve problems and commit to a high level of service, with the flexibility and energy to thrive in a dynamic environment.Duties: short basic version
Opening, monitoring and delivery of translation projects
Manage and coordinate the entire life-cycle of multiple localization projects from quote through project completion to ensure on-time and quality delivery.
Manage project finances, including preparation of quotes/purchase orders, invoices and budgeting 
Analyze needs and resource requirements to plan projects accordingly.
Apply quality control through checkpoint systems to meet client expectations.
Proactively lead the identification of any potential issues, resolve them and close identified gaps
Ensure timely payables to vendors
Expand, manage and resources vendors database. 
Strengthen excellent relationships with internal (colleagues in current and other branches) and external resources (freelancers vendors)
Other ad-hoc tasks either assigned or required to be performed within the scope of main duties.
Detailed duties:
Project planning, scoping, requirements gathering and validation with clients and account manager.
Risk analysis and contingency planning
Leading the internal and external team to successful execution and delivery of client projects
Creating schedule and monitoring timeliness of delivery.
Managing the budget and controlling project costs.
Overseeing project activities and ensuring resolution to any problems that may arise (corrective and preventive action).
Actively seeking ways to optimize delivery, client satisfaction, quality and profitability.
Reporting, both in written and verbal form, to internal and external stakeholders regarding Project scope, financials, progress and status, formally and on an ad-hoc basis as required.
Ensuring profit of project is maintained through the management of margin.
Complaints to the vendor (external resources, translators): sends complaints to the vendor if there is a problem with the quality of the service (lack of punctuality, does not follow the instructions given, etc.).
Establishing and nurturing relationships with the customer, internal teams and external suppliers.
Requirements:Minimum:
Bachelor’s degree (B. A.) from four-year college or university in Business, Language, Localization or Translation studies or related technical field, or equivalent combination of education and experience.
Professional (advanced) spoken and written English, other languages are added advantage.
Experience in working as translation project manager for at least 1 year 
Experience in working with CAT tools (SmartCat, SDL Professional Studio, etc) 
Experience in working with TMS: XTRF or Plunet is preferred
Proficiency with Microsoft Office Suite (Word and Excel)
Internet literate 
Self-discipline and resistance to stress
Keen interest and quick learner of new technologies
Preferred:
Experience in working as translation project manager for at least 2 years 
Experience in translation either as full-timer or freelance translator 
Knowledge of the translation industry and a keen interest in its technology, process, competitive landscape and emerging trends. 
Skills:
Ability to manage multiple priorities in a time-sensitive and deadline-driven work environment (Juggle multiple priorities simultaneously in a fast-paced environment)
Ability to prioritize activities on a daily basis to accomplish project goals
Excellent written and verbal communication and interpersonal skills. 
The ability to lead large, diverse, virtual teams (external resources, freelance translators).
Strong organizational and problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and the ability to multitask
Ability to work remotely 
Self-starter
Energy and a positive attitude.
Proactive individual
Measures of successDelivery of services in line with core KPIs for project management, which include but are not limited to:
Client satisfaction;
On-time delivery;
Cost control and profitability;
Client growth 

]
